original_text: My friends, you have become like those streams. You see my great problem, and you are afraid. My friends, you have become like those streams. You see my great problem, and you are afraid. My friends, you have become like those streams. You see my great problem, and you are afraid. My friends, you have become like those streams.
korean_text: 이제 너희는 아무것도 아니로구나 너희가 두려운 일을 본즉 겁내는구나

sentences.original_text: My friends, you have become like those streams.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 친구들아, 너희는 그 시냇물들 같이 되었구나.

sentences.original_text: My friends, you have become like those streams.
